title: Magic lantern slipping slide [Boy / Girl]
brief_description: Magic lantern set effects slide with dark wooden frame. By sliding the effects slide, a a figure changes from girl features to boy features. Set against a black background. Brown tape adhered to moving slide.
description: Magic lantern set effects slide with dark wooden frame. By sliding the effects slide, a a figure changes from girl features to boy features. Set against a black background. Brown tape adhered to moving slide.
